product_name: White Sierra Discover Me Tank Dress - Special Buy
long_description: Stretchy and wrinkle-resistant, the White Sierra Discover Me Tank Dress frees you up for everyday adventures at home and for travels abroad. Knit blends 95% bamboo rayon with 5% spandex for stretch. Fabric drapes nicely and feels soft to the touch; wicks moisture to keep you dry and comfy. Tank-top styling; small overall geo print and larger paisley print on the waistband. White Sierra Discover Me Tank Dress has bra-friendly straps. Special buy.
short_description: Stretchy and wrinkle-resistant, the White Sierra Discover Me Tank Dress frees you up for everyday adventures at home and for travels abroad.
